pkgmetadata.longdescription: Get Executing Script's Path, from 'Rgui', 'RStudio', 'VSCode', 'Jupyter', 'source()', and 'Rscript' (Shells Including Windows Command Line / / Unix Terminal) // Determine the path of the executing script. Works when running a line or selection in 'Rgui', 'RStudio', 'VSCode', and 'Jupyter', when using 'source()', 'sys.source()', 'debugSource()' in 'RStudio', 'testthat::source_file()', 'knitr::knit()', 'box::use()', and 'compiler::load.cmp()', and when running from a shell.
